amendment.description: To provide for the inclusion of independent regulatory agencies in the application of the Unfunded Mandates Reform Act of 1995 (2 U.S.C. 1501 et seq.).

action.text: Amendment SA 417 proposed by Senator Portman. (consideration: CR S3656-3658; text: CR S3657) To provide for the inclusion of independent regulatory agencies in the application of the Unfunded Mandates Reform Act of 1995 (2 U.S.C. 1501 et seq.).
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 417 proposed by Senator Portman.
